ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges

Class BadgeBurnedDays

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges.BadgeBurnedDays
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BadgeBurnedDays
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The BurnedDays badge is earned when the user has acheived their calories burned goal over a period of ten plus days. Also used to check whether the user has earned the badge
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team06
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • testStreak

        private boolean testStreak()
        Tests if the badge has been earned by looping through the calories burned lifetimes. If a streak of ten plus days has been fulfilled then the badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        test true if current streak is above 10, otherwise false

      • checkBadge

        public boolean checkBadge()
        Tests if the calories burned streak has been achieved. If yes, then the BurnedDays badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        flag true if badge achieved, otherwise false

      • getPercent

        public double getPercent()
        Returns the percent representaion of how much of the badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        percent double value of the percent until completion of the badge

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description of the badge so the user knows what they must do in order to earn the badge.
        Returns:
        description String of the description
